name: v1.4.5
body:
## Change Log

### Fixed

- fix: #172 filtering string slice value failed on struct data. https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/087269de6d8753d49230016945ba73e92e3bc42b
- fix json name tag parsing to ignore stuff after the comma, use struct field name if json tag name not set https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/42d952c72d3defee5dfb8a94f11cfe5b0466b2cd

### Feature

- feat: enable slices of maps on structs https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/6815f548cc050376118c5e9512f8fd6b06aefed6

### Other

- change field to value https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/afe0982e7961c22cbf370769bca6fa3edefd0ff9
- use only latest go version in linter https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/d2cb664d51989e8100a96804a7031650a2488a92
- build(deps): bump github.com/gookit/goutil from 0.5.9 to 0.5.10 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/6bf5f1889c353b648f739972d22f30f3702544af
- build(deps): bump github.com/gookit/goutil from 0.5.10 to 0.5.11 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/1be8266c5d9b632b9c8449e50b92caa383f1e26a
- build(deps): bump github.com/gookit/goutil from 0.5.11 to 0.5.12 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/64a3d93bdeddca7b2a22a4a161a594829c7fb8ba
- improvements to english text grammar https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/e3b585f279992b5e05503b0d86059a8e62933957
- build(deps): bump github.com/gookit/filter from 1.1.3 to 1.1.4 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/69a30a86cb9990f7f2f1faaddc3a7fedac83128f
- build(deps): bump github.com/gookit/goutil from 0.5.12 to 0.5.13 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/03f435ec1ea2396374b9820c2407eabddbb0adc8
- build(deps): bump github.com/gookit/goutil from 0.5.13 to 0.5.15 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/3dda5996b75ebd6bfd1bfcdfb12f108af3c2060f
- modify a Initialization of map https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/541a9addbf313f24c417a3ad59308d5055359882
- build(deps): bump WillAbides/setup-go-faster from 1.7.0 to 1.8.0 https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/eacc97526745221901b1dffc77e31d21db84585c

## New Contributors
* @eloycoto made their first contribution in https://github.com/gookit/validate/pull/174
* @mariogao made their first contribution in https://github.com/gookit/validate/pull/178

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gookit/validate/compare/v1.4.4...v1.4.5

name: v1.4.3
body:
## Change Log

### Fixed

### Update

- up: update the fetch variadic param kind logic https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/d56c71fab00674034ec5954d936721ba4b3d6673

- up: add func for get coped global messages, fix some tests https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/46c714673768ddfc296fba03b8ab04c8b9616b07

### Other

- chore: fix download gitw/chlog fail on release action https://github.com/gookit/validate/commit/9b40050955799426fbdfff5cc93a2aa3864cf75f

### Other

name: v1.2.10
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump github.com/gookit/goutil from 0.3.8 to 0.3.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gookit/validate/pull/86
* Added collection of validation rules for values from arrays, slices, and maps (only for structures) by @AlexBrin in https://github.com/gookit/validate/pull/89


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gookit/validate/compare/v1.2.9...v1.2.10

name: v1.2.9
body:
- Support mulit level struct validate (thanks @AlexBrin)
- Fix some bugs

name: v1.2.6
body:
- 修复一些BUGs
- 支持子结构体字段验证(_当前仅支持二级子结构体_) thanks @fishyww

name: v1.2.3
body:
- update deps
- update readme
- add tests on go `1.15`
- fix: custome error not work on use alias name
- refacting languages register logic

name: v1.2.1
body:
# Release v1.2.1

- update readme
- some bugs fixed

## Update

- new: add new method for add bulitin message
- new: allow setting field map from struct tags, defualt is `json`
- new: allow set message from struct tag
- new: add github actions tests

----------------

## 更新

- 新增：添加用于添加内置消息的新方法
- 新增：允许从struct标记设置字段映射，tag默认为 `json`
- 新增：允许从struct标记设置错误消息，tag默认为 `message`
- 新增：添加github actions测试

name: v1.2.0
body:
## Update

- Supports setting default values for fields. eg: `"required|default:tom"`
- **Important**: When using `filter` on a structure, the filtered value will be updated to the structure
- Added `requiredXXX` series validators
- Added `stringContains|startsWith|endsWith` and other validators
- Camel-style validator names now have underlined aliases. `endsWith` can also be written as` ends_with`
- Fix some known issues
- Update README

## 更新记录

- 支持设置字段的默认值。eg: `"required|default:tom"`
- **重要**：结构体上使用 `filter` 时，将会更新过滤后的值到结构体上
- 新增 `requiredXXX` 系列验证器
- 新增 `stringContains|startsWith|endsWith` 等验证器
- 驼峰式的验证器名称现在都添加了下划线式的别名。 `endsWith` 也可以写为 `ends_with`
- 修复一些已知问题
- 更新README

name: v1.1.4
body:
- add requiredXXX validators(thanks @hookover PR #33 )
- add cnMobile validator
- update readme

name: v1.1.3
body:
- update some logic for file validate
- optimize message format on validator func has variadic args
- fix #17 use regex validate will panic
- add more unit tests
- update readme

name: v1.1.2

- fix: call rule.beforeFunc position is error

name: v1.1.1

- Fix panic in custom filter call because at nil variable check.(#13 thanks @d7561985 )
- Update readme

name: v1.1.0

- update: support filter tag on struct
- add more unit tests
